profile.title: Mombamomba ny Mpampiasa
profile.mustLogin: Tsy maintsy miditra ianao vao afaka mijery ny fikirakirana.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Asehoy ny tany am-boalohany sy ny fandikana
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Asehoy ny tany am-boalohany miaraka amin’ny fandikana
profile.noPrivateKey: Tsy misy lakile tsy miankina amin’ity fitaovana ity havoaka.
profile.setBackupPassword: Apetraka ny tenimiafina hiarovana ny tahiry voaaro:
profile.backupDownloaded: Voatsidika ny tahiry voaaro (backup) voaaro amin’ny teny miafina.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Ampidiro ny tenimiafina amin’ity tahiry voaaro ity:
profile.importSuccess: Nalefa teto amin’ity fitaovana ity ny lakile tsy miankina.
profile.importFailed: Tsy tontosa ny fanafarana lakile (tenimiafina diso na rakitra simba).
profile.keysRotated: Noforonina ny lakile vaovao ary nalefa ny lakile ampahibemaso.
profile.exportKey: Alefa ivelany ny lakile tsy miankina
profile.importKey: Ampidiro ny tahiry voaaro an’ny lakile
profile.keyDisclaimer: Tsy miala amin’ity fitaovana ity mihitsy ny lakile tsy miankinao. Alefaso dika voaaro amin’ny teny miafina mba hamerina azy amin’ny fitaovana hafa.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Ao amin’ny Free ianao—ampiasao ireo safidy Masoandro/Volana haingana etsy ambany. Hiavao raha te-hamoha lohahevitra maro.
profile.backupDesc: Manaova tahiry voaaro amin’ny teny miafina ho an’ny lakileo, ary avereno amin’ny fitaovana hafa mba hifanaraka.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Ataovy blur rehefa tsy ifantohana ny app
profile.loadFailed: Tsy tontosa ny fampiakarana ny mombamomba
profile.followHint: Hiseho ao amin’ny feed Following-anao ny tantarany raha mametraka ho Followers (na Ho an’ny daholobe) izy.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Nisy olana tao amin’ity fizarana ity.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Afindrao amin’ny finday na mailaka voamarinao ny antso sy hafatra miditra. Ny antso/hafatra mivoaka dia afaka mampiseho ny laharanao Chatforia.
profile.errSmsDest: Misafidiana farafahakeliny toerana iray (finday na mailaka).
profile.errQuietHours: Tokony ho eo anelanelan’ny 0 sy 23 ny ora mangina.

chat.selectPrompt: Misafidiana lahatsoratra na efitra hiresahana hanombohana ny resaka

status.filesNote: Hatrany amin’ny rakitra 5. 24 ora ny mahazatra.

premium.heading: Mankanesa Premium
premium.description: Vahao ireo fiasa matanjaka & esory ny doka.

auth.headline: Hafatra azo antoka, manerantany, miaraka amin’ny fandikana avy hatrany
auth.description: Fifandraisana voaaro hatramin’ny ka hatramin’ny (E2E), fandikana tohanan’ny AI, hafatra manjavona, ary antso feo/video.

feature.privacy: Fiainana manokana aloha. Ny angon-drakitrao dia eo am-pelatananao.

auth.desktopTip: Amin’ny solosaina ve ianao? Sintomy amin’ny findainao amin’ny alalan’ny scan.
auth.subhead: Hafatra voaaro, miafina, ary voadika — avy hatrany.
auth.tip: Afaka mampiasa Chatforia amin’ny fitaovana rehetra ianao — na misintona ny app ho traikefa tsara indrindra.
auth.scanHint: Scan-nao mba hisintona ny app na hanokatra amin’ny navigateur.

press.title: Haino aman-jery
press.contact: Ho an’ny fangatahana avy amin’ny haino aman-jery, manorata amin’ny press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Ho an’ny fangatahana avy amin’ny haino aman-jery: press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia dia mpandefa hafatra azo antoka miaraka amin’ny fandikana avy hatrany sy E2E, natao hanamora ny resaka manerantany sady miaro fiainana manokana.
press.assetsText: Logo, pikantsary, sary vokatra (ho avy tsy ho ela).

careers.title: Asa
careers.intro: Ekipa kely izahay manangana mpandefa hafatra manerantany sy miaro fiainana manokana. Raha miraharaha encryption, fidirana ho an’ny rehetra, ary UX mahafinaritra ianao dia mifandraisa.
careers.openRoles: Asa misokatra: Injeniera (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Vokatra, Fanohanana.
careers.apply: Ahoana ny fangatahana: Alefaso amin’ny mailaka ny CV/rohy ao amin’ny jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Momba an’i Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia dia mpandefa hafatra marolafy, misy E2E, fandikana avy hatrany, ary antso feo/video. Tanjonay tsotra: hanampy ny olona hifandray—azo antoka, tsiambaratelo, ary miampita fiteny.

values.privacy: Fiainana manokana aloha: E2E voapetraka ho azy.
values.access: Fidirana ho an’ny rehetra: Fandikana teny 100+ ho azy.

about.howDescription: Voaaro ao amin’ny fitaovanao ny hafatrao alohan’ny handefasana azy. Ny fandikana, ny tahiry, ary ny fifanarahana fitaovana dia natao hampihenana izay hitan’ny sérvernay.

advertise.title: Manao dokambarotra amin’i Chatforia
advertise.description: Tratrao ireo mpampiasa resaka mavitrika amin’ny toerana mendrika sy azo antoka ho an’ny marika. Manolotra afisy hita maso, fiaraha-miombon’antoka, ary promos an-trano izahay. Tsy mahita doka ny Premium.

adsense.withPubId: Amin’izao fotoana izao dia mampiasa Google AdSense izahay. Raha te-hitondra lasibatra amin’ny Google Ads ianao dia ampiasao ny publisher ID {{pubId}} ary angataho ny managed placement amin’ireo unit etsy ambany. Misy ihany koa ny fifanarahana mivantana—ampiasao ny formulaire.
adsense.noPubId: Amin’izao fotoana izao dia mampiasa Google AdSense izahay. Misy ihany koa ny fifanarahana mivantana—ampiasao ny formulaire etsy ambany.

advertise.noPlacements: Tsy mbola misy fametrahana doka voatendry. Ampio ao amin’ny ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Fiverimberenan’ny fivoriana sy fijanonana ela ao amin’ny UI resaka
why.brandSafe: Endrika miaro marika; faneriterena matetika miraharaha
why.sponsoredMoments: Fotoana voasponsor (oh: “Start a Chat” modal) misy
why.deals: Fifanarahana mivantana na amin’ny alalan’ny AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Misaotra! Efa nalefa ny fangatahanao. Hifandray tsy ho ela izahay.
form.missingRequired: Fenoy ny anarana, mailaka, ary hafatra.
form.successToast: Misaotra! Hifandray tsy ho ela izahay.
form.mailtoInfo: Hosokafana ny rindranasan’ny mailakao handefasana ny fangatahana…

upgrade.title: Hiavao
upgrade.subtitle: Misafidiana drafitra mety aminao: esory ny doka amin’ny Plus, na raiso ny fiasa feno amin’ny Premium.

gettingStarted.title: Fanombohana
gettingStarted.subtitle: Vao amin’i Chatforia? Ity torolalana haingana ity no ilaina hahafahanao miasa ao anatin’ny minitra vitsy.

alert.text: Hitombo ity torolalana ity rehefa mandefa fiasa vaovao izahay. Raha misy tsy ampy, ampahafantaro anay amin’ny

section2.title: 2) Manomboha mandefa hafatra
section2.item1: Mamoròna DM na Vondrona ary alefaso ny hafatrao voalohany.
section2.item2: Ampiasao ny fandikana avy hatrany hifandraisana amin’ny fiteny 100+.
section2.item3: Andramo ny hafatra manjavona sy ny mari-pamaky ao amin’ny Mombamomba → Fiainana manokana.

section3.title: 3) Mandehana lavidavitra
section3.item1Part1: Tantano ny drafitrao ao amin’ny pejy
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = tsy misy doka, Premium = fiasa feno).
section3.item2Part1: Ampifandraiso fitaovana fanampiny ary amboary ny tahiry voaaro ao amin’ny

account.q: Ahoana no hamoronana na hamerenana kaonty?
account.a: Sintomy ny app na ampiasao ny tranonkala, tsindrio “Hamorona kaonty”, hamarino ny mailaka/finday. Raha hiverina, ampiasao ny “Very tenimiafina”.

privacy.q: Voaaro ve ny hafatra amin’ny E2E?
privacy.a: Eny. Voaaro E2E ho azy ny hafatra sy antso. Ianao sy ny mpandray ihany no afaka mamaky.

translate.q: Ahoana ny fiasan’ny fandikana avy hatrany?
translate.a: Alefaso ny “Adika ho azy” ao amin’ny Fikirakirana → Bika & Teny. Mandika eny an-toerana izahay raha tohana; raha tsy izany amin’ny API voaaro miaraka amin’ny metadata voafetra.

contact.a: Manorata amin’ny support@chatforia.com. Ampidiro pikantsary sy ny kinovan’ny app.

contact.title: Mifandraisa aminay
contact.errorSend: Tsy voaray. Alefaso amin’ny mailaka support@chatforia.com raha azafady.

intro.body: Ity politika ity dia manazava ny fomba iangonan’i Chatforia (“izahay”) amin’ny fampiasanao ny app sy ny serivisy. Noforoninay i Chatforia mba hampihena izay angon-drakitra azonay jerena.

infoWeCollect.title: Angon-drakitra angonina
infoWeCollect.account: Angon-drakitra kaonty (oh: mailaka/finday) hamoronana sy hiarovana kaonty.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Votoaty voaaro (hafatra/antso) dia E2E; tsy azontsika vakiana.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Antontan’isa/fikorontanana toy ny tatitra crash, karazana fitaovana, na analytics tsotra hanatsarana ny fahombiazan’ny serivisy.

howWeUse.title: Fampiasana ny angon-drakitra
howWeUse.provide: Hanolotra sy hiaro ny serivisy (auth, fisorohana spam/fanimbana).

sharing.title: Fizarana
sharing.body: Tsy mivarotra angon-drakitra manokana izahay. Mety hizara voafetra amin’ny mpanodina (oh: push, analytics) ambany fifanarahana hentitra.

rights.title: Zonanao
rights.body: Miankina amin’ny faritrao (oh: GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), afaka mangataka fidirana, fanitsiana, famafana, na fialana amin’ny fanodinana sasany ianao. Fifandraisa: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Fitehirizana & fiarovana
retention.body: Tazoninay ny ilaina amin’ny fiasan’ny serivisy ihany ary mampihatra fiarovana indostrialy. Tsy azonay vakiana ny E2E.

children.title: Ankizy
children.body: Tsy natao ho an’ny latsaky ny 13 taona i Chatforia (na araka ny lalàna eo an-toerana).

changes.title: Fanovana
changes.body: Hampiditra fanavaozana eto izahay ary hanavao ny daty “Nohavaozina farany”.

intro.body: Amin’ny fampiasanao an’i Chatforia dia manaiky ireo Fepetra ireo ianao. Raha tsy manaiky, aza mampiasa ny serivisy.

accounts.title: Kaonty
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Manomeza vaovao marina ary tehirizo ho azo antoka ny fidirana.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Tompon’andraikitra amin’ny hetsika ao amin’ny kaontinao ianao.

acceptableUse.title: Fampiasana azo ekena
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Aza mametraka votoaty tsy ara-dalàna, mampijaly, na manitsakitsa-bola; aza manao spam na fanararaotana mandeha ho azy.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Afaka mampiato/mametra ny kaonty raha misy fandikan-dalàna.

yourContent.title: Ny votoatinao
yourContent.body: Mitazona zo amin’ny votoatinao ianao. Manome anay zo ilaina hiasan’ny serivisy (oh: fitaterana, fitahirizana, fandikana) ianao.

disclaimer.title: Fanilihana andraikitra & andraikitra ara-dalàna
disclaimer.body: Omena “araka ny izy” ny serivisy tsy misy antoka. Araka izay avelan’ny lalàna, tsy tompon’andraikitra amin’ny fahavoazana ankolaka i Chatforia.

changes.title: Fanovana
changes.body: Mety hanavao ireo fepetra ireo izahay; ny fampiasana mitohy aorian’ny fanovana dia midika fankatoavana.

doNotSell.title: Aza amidy na zaraina ny Mombamomba Ahy
doNotSell.body: Tsy mivarotra mombamomba manokana i Chatforia. Afaka mandefa fangatahana araka ny CPRA ihany ny mponina any California amin’ny bokotra etsy ambany.

cookies.title: Fikirakirana Cookie
cookies.body: Mampiasa cookie kely i Chatforia (oh: session, fiarovana). Tsy mampiasa cookie doka an’ny antoko fahatelo izahay. Tantano ao amin’ny fikirakiran’ny navigateur-nao.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Tsy voaentana ny satan’ny laharana finday.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Tsy mbola manana laharana. Misafidiana amin’ny kaody faritra hanombohana ny SMS.

startChatModal.title: Hanomboka resaka
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Soraty anarana, anarana mpampiasa, finday, na mailaka…
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Karohy amin’ny anarana mpampiasa na finday
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Soraty anarana mpampiasa na finday ary tsindrio Karohy.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Hiseho rehefa voatahiry ho fifandraisana ny finday/mailaka nampidirinao.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Tsy nahomby ny fanombohana resaka amin’ireo voafantina.

sounds.freeNotice: Ao amin’ny Free ianao — miseho fa voahidy ny feo Premium. Hiavao raha te-hamoha rehetra.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Mitaky drafitra Premium ity fiasa ity.

aiSettings.title: Fikirakirana AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Fehezo ny fandikana, valiny marani-tsaina, ary valin’i ForiaBot ho azy.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Adika ho azy ny hafatra miditra
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Asehoy ny lahatsoratra tany am-boalohany miaraka amin’ny fandikana
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Alefa amin’ny AI (voadio) ny hafatra vitsivitsy vao haingana mba hanolorana valiny haingana.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Saronana ny teny vetaveta ao amin’ny soso-kevitra AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Raha ON, ho sarona ny teny voamarika ao amin’ny soso-kevitra
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Alefaso ny valiny ho azy rehefa sahirana aho

accessibilitySettings.title: Fahafahana miditra & Fampandrenesana
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Safidy hanamorana ny fampiasana an’i Chatforia na dia tsy mampiasa feo aza.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Manomboka amin’ny habeny mahazatra. Ampitomboy raha mila soratra lehibe kokoa.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Fampitandremana hita maso ho an’ny hafatra & antso
Asehoy tontonana sy fikopakopahan’ny lohateny mba tsy ho tara.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Hihorohoro rehefa misy hafatra vaovao (raha tohana)
Ampihevero hihorohoro ny fitaovana rehefa misy fampandrenesana.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Mamirapiratra ny efijery rehefa misy antso miditra
Famirapiratra fohy rehefa misy antso.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Adika ho soratra ho azy ny hafatra feo
Asio dikanteny amin’ny hafatra feo voaray.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Fampitandremana hita maso ho an’ny hafatra & antso
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Asehoy tontonana sy fikopahan’ny lohateny mba tsy ho tara.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Ampihevero hihorohoro ny fitaovana amin’ny fampandrenesana.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Mamirapiratra ny efijery rehefa misy antso
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Mamirapiratra fohy rehefa misy antso miditra.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Tehirizo ciphertext ihany ao amin’ny sérvera. Manafoana AI/Fandikana sy topy maso fandrindrana.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Karohy amin’ny anaram-bosotra, anarana, anarana mpampiasa, na finday
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Zarao ny rohy fanasana mba hanombohana resaka avy hatrany.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Mijanòna hifandray eny an-dalana amin’ny Chatforia ho an’ny iOS sy Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Toro-hevitra: Mitohy mifanaraka ny hafatrao amin’ny web sy mobile.

randomChat.title: Resaka Kisendrasendra
randomChat.description: Hihaona amin’olona vaovao avy hatrany. Hitady mifanentana izahay ary hanokatra efitra vonjimaika.
randomChat.saveGuard: Resaka olona amin’olona ihany no azo tehirizina
